trends: There have been 25 other sightings in Plano
There were no other sightings in Plano on or around May 2nd 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsLying down on a flat fold out chair in front yard looking up at the stars threw mostly clear sky.when under the clouds six or seven red,yellow,and white orbs or balls of light flying in a V formation went under and threw then back out of a small amount of clouds across the whole sky right above my hed in 5 seconds totaly sielent.I could tell it was not a solid craft because I could see the clouds in the middle of the V formation even though it was so fast and when they went threw the clouds the lights were kind of foggy looking.There was no sound!!and it flew perfectly straight.The V shape was pritty large,so it was ether very low or really big.This is one of about 14 differnt type of sightings I have had over Plano Texas for the past two years usauly from May to August.That was one of the best ones Ive seen.The first one I saw I couldnt sleep for three days now I wonder, why am I fieling a report? what can anyone do?Thats not our technology it was as if it interd into our demention for a few seconds then left.
Summary: Six orbes in V formation different colours flying under clouds fast,and silent
